name: Aethermoor Courier-Class Airship
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Blueprint cutaway: Aethermoor Courier-Class Airship, top/side/cross-section/decks, ballast, pressure hulls, engines, crew, clean blueprint, fantasy nautical/aeronautical vernacular with realm materials, skyward romantic realism, cloudstone and brass, wind-swept forms, airship motifs, sturdy functional blueprint vernacular, palette: navy, gold, cloud-white, warm sun highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Use numbered callout pins (01, 02, 03â€¦) instead of long text annotations. Include a clean legend area without rendering complex paragraphs., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Blueprint cutaway of Aethermoor Courier-Class Airship.
callouts: numbered pins 01..10; legend area reserved; no paragraph labels
revised_prompt: Imagine a painting that portrays an Aethermoor Courier-Class Airship from a beloved fantasy tabletop role-playing game, akin to Dungeons & Dragons 5th edition. Be sure to draw upon a grounded, medieval-fantasy aesthetic and avoid any hints of modern technology. Render the airship in a consistent, illustrative, traditional paintbrush style with a focus on cultural coherence and craftmanship. Sketch a detailed top, side, and cross-section view of the airship, showing off the design of the ballast, pressure hulls, and engines, as well as spaces for the crew. Capture the essence of the ship's classic fantasy nautical and aeronautical design, emphasizing materials common in this realm, such as cloudstone and polished brass, shaped by the winds into smooth, flowing forms. Despite the realism, infuse the scene with a touch of romanticism that evokes the awe and drama of skyward adventure. The color palette should lean on navy, gold, and cloud-white and be highlighted with warm hues suggesting sunlight. Remember to make the blueprint crisp and legible, using numbered callout pins (01, 02, 03...) in place of lengthy text labels, and include a comprehensible legend area without complex paragraphs. All symbols should be meaningful, and there should be no nonsensical letter combinations, scientific user interfaces, signs from the modern era, hyper-real CGI, or anime influence. The image should not contain bloom glare or any artifacts as well.
